job_title: Duck Creek DMS Project Manager/Scrum Master
jd: Dear Vendor Partner,My name is Akash Raj Srivastava, and I represent VBeyond Corporation, a global recruitment firm with 18+ years of industry experience. We specialize in sourcing and placing highly skilled talent to meet the unique needs of our clients.Our client is seeking a Duck Creek DMS Project Manager/Scrum Master for a Remote (Occasional travel to Princeton, NJ) position. Please share if you have any suitable candidate for this role –Job Title: Duck Creek DMS Project Manager/Scrum MasterLocation: Remote (Occasional travel to Princeton, NJ)Duration: Long Term ContractExperience:Advanced agile knowledge and implementation for teams not currently operating with this methodologyDuck Creek experience -DMS mandatoryStrong knowledge and examples of facilitating quartering planning cyclesExecuting on Risk MitigationLeading refinements (optimizing flow of ready work)Facilitating Scrum Ceremonies Please share your consultant’s updated resume along with their visa copy, photo ID, and I-94 details.Best Regards,Akash Raj Srivastava
